content: Add overdue indicator - red badge showing days overdue on top-right of cards
Add colored ring border around member avatars matching card type (purple=grief, teal=accident, amber=birthday)
Enhance hover state - increase shadow lift on card hover for better feedback
Implement relative dates - show '3 days ago' instead of 'Due: 13 Nov' for overdue items
Make Complete button outlined white background (not colored) for better visual hierarchy
Add swipe-to-complete gesture for mobile power users
Add stage priority badges for grief - 'Week 1', 'Month 1', etc. for quick identification
Add member context - display age or last contact date in cards
Add haptic feedback on Complete button (if browser supports)
Test all improvements at 390px and verify enhanced usability
